name: Open Source HardWare Library - candidates
tagline: documents not yet in OSHWL's SELECTION repository
body:
#*candidate* documents

... which have not yet been ["selected"](http://oshwl.github.io/SELECTION), so please improve them or add new ones!

it would be nice to have the documents meet [a few criteria](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/blob/master/criteria.md).

big categories of OSHW work are listed below (further detailed [here](https://raw.github.com/OSHWL/candidates/master/contents.txt)).

**"intermediate OSHW"**, which may (also) be *useful for work in other categories*:

   - [electronics](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/electronics)
   - [free/libre/open-source software for OSHW](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/floss4oshw)
   - [OSHW management](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/oshw-mgmt)
   - [manufacturing](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/manufacturing)
   - [materials](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/materials)

rather **"application-oriented OSHW** work":

   - [**energy**](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/energy)
   - [**food**](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/food)
   - [**transport**](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/transport)
   - [cleaning](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/cleaning)  
   - [monitoring](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/monitoring)
   - [structures](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/structures)
   - [water](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/water)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
